1. A Message From The Mayor

  2. The Boards and Commissions in the Alvarado city government are comprised of volunteer citizens.

  3. City Council

    The City Council has a Mayor, Mayor Pro-Tem, and five council members.

    6. Kevin Thomas- Mayor Pro-Tem
    7. Scott Arthur
